Inflection, a fast-growing and profitable technology start-up in Silicon Valley, is seeking a Senior DevOps Engineer who can automate, pipe, package, and tune Inflection to new levels of success. The ideal candidate is hands-on, passionate about technology, and can sed, awk, and grep their way through any distro. This is a full-time position located in Redwood Shores.

http://inflection.com/careers/jobs/senior-devops-engineer
